attributes.name: Eastern Runestone
attributes.description: A runestone that pulses with light and warmth whenever it is brought near drink.

attributes.name: Ebonwood
attributes.description: A dark wood that seeps a black sap. Lightweight and sturdy.

attributes.name: Ebony Scale
attributes.description: Dark scales removed from an Ebonscale Alligator.

attributes.description: The gross goo that flows through the Lost. Improve your Lost Bane trophy with this.

attributes.description: The fang of a Lost Spider.

attributes.name: Egede Serpe
attributes.description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used to decorate your home, giving a large boost to your peacocking score.
attributes.parsed_description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used to decorate your home, giving a large boost to your peacocking score.

attributes.name: Electric Eel Bait
attributes.description: Fishing Bait. Gives a large boost to chance of catching bigger fish in salt water.
attributes.parsed_description: Fishing Bait. Gives a large boost to chance of catching bigger fish in salt water.

attributes.name: Elegant Appetizer
attributes.description: Appetizers for a meal.

attributes.name: Elemental Heart
attributes.description: A heart of pure elemental energy. This item is used to craft Tuning Orb to allow access to expeditions.
attributes.parsed_description: A heart of pure elemental energy. This item is used to craft Tuning Orb to allow access to expeditions.

attributes.name: Ember Stone
attributes.description: A stone that glows with an eternal warmth. Any Arcanist would be delighted to put it in a furnace of some kind.
attributes.parsed_description: A stone that glows with an eternal warmth. Any Arcanist would be delighted to put it in a furnace of some kind.

attributes.name: Emblem of Fortitude
attributes.description: "This rune glows and flickers with power. You suspect it could be applied to a shield to enhance the defensive properties."

attributes.description: Used in Jewelcrafting, but must be cut and polished at a Stonecutting Station first.

attributes.name: Enchanted Azoth Wood
attributes.description: Wood to be used for the core of a bow. Its hints of azoth give it a strength beyond regular wood.

attributes.description: Crafted to armor the Dryads of Malevolence, it is said to provide protection against Corruption.
